Headline: No trains between Kimball  and Southport
ShortDescription:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and
Southport due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and
Southport due to track conditions.

As a result, trains are operating only between Southport  and the Loop at this time.

Shuttle buses are now available between Kimball and Southport provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. Consider using the #81 Lawrence and #82 Kimball busses to further continue your trip.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
